snippet.title: The 9th Gate Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/697130/The_9th_Gate/
Itch.io Page: 
https://gospacepups.itch.io/the-9th-gate

Search within the confines of a large residential complex for a set of cursed dolls that hold the key to saving a young girl's soul before the night is over. 

Expect resistance from the spirits that haunt the complex; from shy elusive ghost children to demonic monsters who will can sniff out your presence. 

Expect chills, and sweaty palms, and wet seats. The game progressively gets harder until you are neck deep in among the many horrors who gently brush along your skin, so long as they don't yet notice you.

Expect the unexpected because every individual's playthrough is unique. The spirits themselves decide when best to appear and when not to. Perhaps that pained groan in the dark might be rusty pipes settling or perhaps it might be unspeakable terror waiting to consume your soul.

The 9th Gate haunts attics and basements this October 2018.
